headline.main: British Watchdog Tells Banks to Text Time-Poor Customers
headline.print_headline: British Watchdog Tells Banks to Text Time-Poor Customers

docs.snippet: Annual account summaries have failed to spur banking competition and the use of text messages and mobile device apps is more effective in changing behaviour of Britain's middle classes, a top financial regulator said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Annual account summaries have failed to spur banking competition and the use of text messages and mobile device apps is more effective in changing behaviour of Britain's middle classes, a top financial regulator said on Wednesday.

headline.main: 5 Things to Know About Hillary Clinton and Her Private Email
headline.print_headline: 5 Things to Know About Hillary Clinton and Her Private Email

docs.snippet: Former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton on Tuesday answered questions for the first time about her use of a private email system while serving as the nation's top diplomat, a story that's disrupted the plans for the launch of her expected...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton on Tuesday answered questions for the first time about her use of a private email system while serving as the nation's top diplomat, a story that's disrupted the plans for the launch of her expected campaign for president in 2016.

headline.main: US, California Modify Area for Renewable Energy Plants
headline.print_headline: US, California Modify Area for Renewable Energy Plants

docs.snippet: The state and federal governments will move forward on less than half the California desert land initially designated for renewable energy plants, officials said Tuesday, leaving millions of acres in limbo as local governments decide how they want...
docs.lead_paragraph: The state and federal governments will move forward on less than half the California desert land initially designated for renewable energy plants, officials said Tuesday, leaving millions of acres in limbo as local governments decide how they want to handle large-scale solar, wind and geothermal projects.

headline.main: UK Shoppers Would Switch Brands, Pay More to Avoid Use of Slaves: Poll
headline.print_headline: UK Shoppers Would Switch Brands, Pay More to Avoid Use of Slaves: Poll

docs.snippet: The majority of shoppers in the United Kingdom would switch brands or pay higher prices to avoid the use of slave labor in the products they buy, a rights group poll showed on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The majority of shoppers in the United Kingdom would switch brands or pay higher prices to avoid the use of slave labor in the products they buy, a rights group poll showed on Wednesday.

headline.main: Court Rules for Van Der Garde Against Sauber
headline.print_headline: Court Rules for Van Der Garde Against Sauber

docs.snippet: An Australian court has found in favor of Dutch driver Giedo van der Garde in his bid to force the Sauber Formula One team to let him drive for them this season....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Australian court has found in favor of Dutch driver Giedo van der Garde in his bid to force the Sauber Formula One team to let him drive for them this season.

headline.main: Indiana Lawmaker Apologizes After Online 'Sexting' Reports
headline.print_headline: Indiana Lawmaker Apologizes After Online 'Sexting' Reports

docs.snippet: An Indiana legislator issued an apology Tuesday for what he calls "poor judgment" following an online report that he sent nude photographs of himself and gifts to a woman tied to a 2013 sexting scandal involving a former New York congressman....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Indiana legislator issued an apology Tuesday for what he calls "poor judgment" following an online report that he sent nude photographs of himself and gifts to a woman tied to a 2013 sexting scandal involving a former New York congressman.

headline.main: Lewis Rebounds, Cron Homers as Angels Beat Rangers
headline.print_headline: Lewis Rebounds, Cron Homers as Angels Beat Rangers

docs.snippet: Colby Lewis rebounded from a rough spring debut to pitch three scoreless innings for the Texas Rangers in a 5-4 loss to the Los Angeles Angels on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colby Lewis rebounded from a rough spring debut to pitch three scoreless innings for the Texas Rangers in a 5-4 loss to the Los Angeles Angels on Tuesday.

headline.main: Lopetegui Hails 'Fantastic' Porto After Basel Rout
headline.print_headline: Lopetegui Hails 'Fantastic' Porto After Basel Rout

docs.snippet: Porto's four fantastic goals showed the gulf in class with their Champions League victims Basel, who were outgunned in every department in their last-16 second leg on Tuesday....

headline.main: Di Matteo Left Wondering How Four-Goal Schalke Are Out
headline.print_headline: Di Matteo Left Wondering How Four-Goal Schalke Are Out

docs.snippet: Schalke 04 coach Roberto Di Matteo was finding it hard to take in how his team managed to score four goals at Real Madrid on Tuesday but still failed to get past the holders into the Champions League quarter-finals....
docs.lead_paragraph: Schalke 04 coach Roberto Di Matteo was finding it hard to take in how his team managed to score four goals at Real Madrid on Tuesday but still failed to get past the holders into the Champions League quarter-finals.

headline.main: Hernandez Debuts With 2 Hitless Frames, Rockies Rip Mariners
headline.print_headline: Hernandez Debuts With 2 Hitless Frames, Rockies Rip Mariners

docs.snippet: Felix Hernandez's first spring start began with a 400-foot flyout and a walk before the Seattle ace settled down to throw two hitless innings Tuesday in the Mariners' 9-3 loss to a Colorado Rockies split squad....
docs.lead_paragraph: Felix Hernandez's first spring start began with a 400-foot flyout and a walk before the Seattle ace settled down to throw two hitless innings Tuesday in the Mariners' 9-3 loss to a Colorado Rockies split squad.
